name: Sky-High Interest Rates
title: World's Highest Real Interest Rate
description: In 2023, Madagascar recorded a real interest rate of 41.3%, the highest globally, indicating a challenging borrowing environment.

name: Lending Risks Galore
title: Top Risk Premium on Lending
description: With a risk premium on lending at 43.9% in 2023, Madagascar leads the world, highlighting significant financial risks for lenders.

name: Utility Struggles
title: Lowest Utility Services Efficiency
description: Madagascar's utility services scored 35.0 in 2024, the lowest globally, reflecting inefficiencies in service provision.

name: Power Outage Woes
title: Highest Value Lost Due to Electrical Outages
description: In 2022, electrical outages resulted in a 24% loss of sales for affected firms in Madagascar, the highest worldwide.

name: Short Schooling Span
title: Shortest Compulsory Education Duration
description: Madagascar mandates only 5 years of compulsory education as of 2023, the shortest globally, impacting educational attainment.

name: Education Repetition Challenge
title: High Primary School Repetition Rates
description: In 2018, 26.1% of students repeated primary school in Madagascar, indicating challenges in educational progression.

name: Teacher Training Deficit
title: Lowest Trained Teachers in Secondary Education
description: Only 15.9% of secondary teachers were trained in 2019, the lowest globally, affecting education quality in Madagascar.

name: Minimal Tertiary Investment
title: Lowest Government Expenditure on Tertiary Education
description: Madagascar's government spent just 0.038% of GDP per capita on tertiary education in 2016, the lowest globally.

name: Sanitation Shortfall
title: Lowest Urban Basic Sanitation Access
description: In 2022, only 21.6% of Madagascar's urban population had access to basic sanitation services, the lowest globally.

name: Empowered Women Workforce
title: High Female Labor Force Participation
description: In 2024, 82.6% of Madagascar's female population aged 15+ participated in the labor force, showcasing strong female workforce engagement.
